name: The Keyboard
description:
The game contains 30 different levels for playing.

There is a keyboard in each level, all you need to do is enter the correct text or perform the correct operation according to the level hints.
But this is not just a simple keyboard, it can rotate, disappear, and even launch like a rocket!
Alternatively, you can coax it to sleep or play hide and seek with it…

This is the first game we've made, and we hope you have fun playing it :D
